metadata.Title: CVE-2022-23122 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - high
metadata.Description: This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code onaffected installations of Netatalk. Authentication is not required toexploit this vulnerability. The specific flaw exists within thesetfilparams function. The issue results from the lack of proper validationof the length of user-supplied data prior to copying it to a fixed-lengthstack-based buffer. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to executecode in the context of root. Was ZDI-CAN-15837.This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code onaffected installations of Netatalk. Authentication is not required toexploit this vulnerability.The specific flaw exists within the setfilparams function. The issueresults from the lack of proper validation of the length of user-supplieddata prior to copying it to a fixed-length stack-based buffer. An attackercan leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of root.]

criterions.comment: netatalk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
